mapper.select: select id, user_id, record_id, seat_num, seat_info, money, status, add_time, phone from t_order where id = #{id}

select id, user_id, record_id, seat_num, seat_info, money, status, add_time, phone from t_order
limit #{pageable.offset}, #{pageable.pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into t_order(user_id, record_id, seat_num, seat_info, money, status, add_time, phone) values (#{userId}, #{recordId}, #{seatNum}, #{seatInfo}, #{money}, #{status}, #{addTime}, #{phone})

insert into t_order(user_id, record_id, seat_num, seat_info, money, status, add_time, phone) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.recordId}, #{entity.seatNum}, #{entity.seatInfo}, #{entity.money}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.addTime}, #{entity.phone})

insert into t_order(user_id, record_id, seat_num, seat_info, money, status, add_time, phone) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.recordId}, #{entity.seatNum}, #{entity.seatInfo}, #{entity.money}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.addTime}, #{entity.phone})
on duplicate key update user_id = values(user_id), record_id = values(record_id), seat_num = values(seat_num), seat_info = values(seat_info), money = values(money), status = values(status), add_time = values(add_time), phone = values(phone)
mapper.update:
update t_order
user_id = #{userId},
record_id = #{recordId},
seat_num = #{seatNum},
seat_info = #{seatInfo},
money = #{money},
status = #{status},
add_time = #{addTime},
phone = #{phone},
where id = #{id}
